orga.title: Subdomain for session notes
orga.body:
Hi there, the session notes is now using docsify and is currently here: https://jscraftcamp.github.io/jscc19-sessions

If you could add a subdomain like notes2019.jscraftcamp.org we could add a CNAME to the session notes repository and have something more connected to the jscraftcamp.org site.

orga.title: Contact sponsors via email
orga.body:
We want all sponsor items to be covered and need to  contact sponsors therefore.
In the past years we wrote emails to previous sponsors.  Going through the past issues might reveal  a lot of them who are still interested ... or find new ways to find sponsors

see #570 for 2019 sponsors

orga.title: Find a location
orga.body:
We need a location 
- for about 100 people, 
- with a lot of rooms and 
- space for break out sessions,
- an area where we can run the open space
- outside area would be really nice, it will be summer (Virtual Identity is a great example)

------

- Ask Virtual Identity
- maybe also CodeCentric
  - on 2 floors
  - more than 10 rooms available
  - open space room exists
  - will post some pics on slack
  - doing it on Friday is no problem

orga.title: Find a date
orga.body:
We plan for
- at least two days, Friday+Saturday
- optionally Thursday evening/afternoon for a pre-session

-----
depending on location
- 10 or 24 July

orga.title: Find a new (logo) color
orga.body:
see how we did it in 2019 
https://twitter.com/JSCraftCamp/status/1106879993651572736

orga.title: Link the sponsoring items to the new page
Find facilitator
orga.body: Tobias might be interested, let's figure it out once we have the date final.

orga.title: Playground/Spielecke for kids
orga.body: Let's ask who would bring kids

orga.title: Collect jobs to be done, so people can assign themselves when registering
orga.body:
- [ ] create a new repo and a project where everyone can join,  do a two-step process, people "apply" and we add them to the repo and then they assign themself
- [ ] add all tasks we have to "give away"
- [ ] tweet about it, so people can assign themselves
- [ ] remind people before the event, so they come and are aware

orga.title: Update page to state jscc20 (not jscc19 anymore)
orga.body:
- update title
- add "jscc20 coming in summer"
- "date will be announced when known"
- archive the 2019 page (and link in footer)
- link 2020 sponsoring page to github sponsoring project

In #811 the page might be redone, this ticket is only meant to update the current site asap.

orga.title: Tweet sponsoring items, one by one
Update the team page
orga.body: Add all current organizers to https://jscraftcamp.org/theteam.html

orga.title: Create nametags
orga.body:
- [ ] figure out how to do name tags (by a sponsor, printed, ....??)
- [ ] open a new ticket where this will be done

Why? To make no-shows transparent

(see https://github.com/jscraftcamp/website/issues/546)

orga.title: Send tweets to the previous sponsors, to remind/ask them to sponsor again
orga.body:
- [ ] tweet the previous sponsors
- [ ] contact them via the jscc19 issues, where there had been discussions on it

sponsors.title: Bring a BBQ and one who runs it 🔥🔥👨🏽‍🍳👨🏽‍🍳
sponsors.body: Last year we had the issue that one BBQ was not enough, if you have one standing around in your office, we would b e glad if you bring it and run the BBQing at the Friday evening party.

sponsors.title: Sponsor 500 Euro 💰💰💰💰💰
sponsors.body:
## Why money?
At the event some spontaneous expenses come up from time to time. E.g. in 2017 it was so hot, that we filled up a small swimming pool with ice cubes to cool down the drinks, and also our feet :), see [here](https://twitter.com/SandraZollner/status/888402447672193024).
Those kind of things we do not plan for, and since we as organizers do not collect any money we want to make sure that we have a sponsor who can cover those things when needed.

## How does it work?
Since you as a sponsor will have five seats and we expect people from your company to be on site, the best way is to bring the money and be available whenever needed. So we can come and ask you to pay whatever comes up as a surprising expense.

sponsors.title: Sponsor needed for lunch on Friday 🍱 🍔 🍕 🌮 🍇 - 💰💰💰💰💰💰💰💰💰
sponsors.body:
## Why food?

No Food, no craftsmanship! Even the best people/coder need a full stomach - help us get some delicious energy-restorings for our guests. Of course as a sponsor you can either have a say in what to serve or you can leave it completely up to us to choose the right developers nutriment. And last year we got them all fed, so it's not as hard as it sounds :).

## How does it work?

We need about 800,- (8,- pP)

Last year we asked some food companies for offers and had the sponsor confirm that amount up front. Once the food was delivered on the day the sponsor pulled out the credit card and made all attendees happy by enabling them to fill up their stomaches. And boy, they had been happier and their energy levels had been restored and they went for another half a day ... [until the party][party].

[party]: https://github.com/jscraftcamp/website/issues/821

sponsors.title: Sponsor needed for the Party Friday evening - 💰💰💰💰💰💰💰💰💰💰
sponsors.body:
## Why a party?
At the end of the first day we want to throw a party

If the party has music, BBQ or just drinks is up to the sponsor. We would like to have a party and leave it to those bringing the money what can be afforded, of course we help organizing if wanted.

## Last year?
This might cost ~800,- Euros, depending on how much the sponsor wants to provide.
We had an epic party at Virtual Identity using the garden surroundings and the event space. We had a BBQ, music, cold drinks, etc ...

sponsors.title: Sponsor needed for snacks on Saturday 🍌🍎🍪🍐🍩🍦 - 💰
sponsors.body:
## Why Snacks?

The night before was a party. If the attendees don't need a snack now, they must have some other secret sauce to get their bodies back up to speed. But many rely on a sponsor to help out and prevent a low blood sugar by providing quick energy refilling snacks in the form of sweets, baked goods and candy. Keep those hard working brains happy - either by choosing yourself what to get or just leave it up to us to find the right sugar-bombs!

## How does it work?

Cost ~100,- depending on what the sponsor orders.
Ideally the sponsor orders the snacks, to be delivered to the location. Feel free to ask us in this ticket about details.

Last year we asked some food companies for offers and had the sponsor confirm that amount up front. Once the food was delivered on the day the sponsor pulled out the credit card and made all attendees happy by enabling them to making the blood sugar level catch up.

sponsors.title: Sponsor needed for Beverages 🍼🍹🥛🍵🍻 - 💰💰💰💰💰
sponsors.body:
## Why Drinks?

The human body is made out of 90% of water - a good reason to always stay hydratred. For a developer, it might only be 70% water and 20% coffee (which [we also search a sponsor for][coffee]). Still: we need some nice beverages for our guests to stay fluid. Help us by either sponsoring the drinks completely or let us help you with a selection we like!

## How does it work?

Cost are around 500,- Euro.
Ideally the sponsor orders drinks that get delivered to the location. Feel free to ping us here in this ticket about past experience of what and how much to order.
 
Last year we ordered the amount of drinks we thought will be enough. The cool thing is that most companies also take back the bottles that had not been opened yet. The bill will be sent to the sponsors address afterwards.

[coffee]: https://github.com/jscraftcamp/website/issues/825

sponsors.title: Sponsor needed for snacks on Friday 🍌🍎🍪🍐🍩🍦 - 💰
sponsors.body:
# Why Snacks?

Prevent a low blood sugar by providing quick energy refilling snacks in the form of sweets, baked goods and candy. Keep those hard working brains happy - either by choosing yourself what to get or just leave it up to us to find the right sugar-bombs!

# How does it work?

Last year we asked some food companies for offers and had the sponsor confirm that amount up front. Once the food was delivered on the day the sponsor pulled out the credit card and made all attendees happy by enabling them to making the blood sugar level catch up.

sponsors.title: Sponsor needed for Coffee, Barista, ... ☕️ ☕️ ☕️ ☕️ - 💰💰💰
sponsors.body:
# Why Coffee?
Many people want to have a coffee, especially in the morning when the open space starts many people crave for a coffee. But also after lunch many like to grab a coffee.

# How does it work?
Last year we had rented two coffee machines and cups from an external company. The coffee was prepared in two 10 liter "tanks", so we always had warm coffee.
If the sponsor for the coffee has a demand for a higher quality coffee or service, the attendees will definitely appreciate it.

sponsors.title: Sponsor needed for Stickers - 💰
sponsors.body:
# Why Stickers?
People love to have stickers, put them on their laptops, office, desk, etc. So let's give it to them.

# How does it work?
The costs are about 100,- Euro.
Ideally the sponsor aligns with the JSCraftCamp team **via this issue** here 
1) what the stickers will look like
2) how many to order and
3) brings the stickers to the event
4) so they can be spread among all participants.

If you have any other wishes, as a sponsor, feel free to speak up. Use this issue here.

sponsors.title: Sponsor needed for lunch on Saturday 🍱 🍔 🍕 🌮 🍇 - 💰💰💰💰💰💰💰💰💰
sponsors.body:
## Why food?

No Food, no craftsmanship! Even the best people/coder need a full stomach - help us get some delicious energy-restorings for our guests. And boy, they had been happier and their energy levels had been restored and they went for another half a day (or longer).

sponsors.title: Sponsor for the location - 💰💰💰💰💰
sponsors.body:
We would like a location with the following properties:
- fits about 100 people
- has a couple of rooms
- has a big gathering space
- can be used Friday+Saturday
- (optional) party on Saturday in the location

sponsors.title: Sponsor needed for T-Shirts 👚 👕 👚 👕 👚 👕 - 💰💰💰💰💰💰💰💰💰💰
sponsors.body:
# Why T-Shirts?
We want to be a nice community of crafters and to show this we want to wear the same t-shirt.
This is also a nice souvenir, which reminds us about that great event.
Everybody who attends has the chance to give us his t-shirt size to register for a shirt.

# How does it work?
Last year we found a t-shirt shop in Munich which created nice prints on t-shirts made of high quality cotton.

sponsors.title: Sponsor needed for renting chairs, beer benches, cuttlery 🍴🍴🍴💺 💺 💺 - 💰💰💰
sponsors.body:
## Why chairs?
We have a big hall and not enough chairs available in the office. In order for all people to have a seat while gathering in the center of the open space we need to rent chairs.
We will also need some benches (Bierbaenke) for sitting outside.
Estimated cost ~300 Euro.

## How does it work?
Last year we contracted an external company, that was payed directly by the sponsor. We, the JSCraftCamp organizers, only organzied that the company delivers the right number of the chairs we wanted. Once they were delivered, the evening before the event volunteers set them up in the event space.

The payment will be done by the sponsor directly to the company where we rent the chairs from. We will put you in contact and you (the sponsor) can handle it from that point on.
